name: Sack
death_text: He's gone. You can get through now.
check: It's Sack. He can't move as his limbs have all been torn off by other creatures in the dreamworld.

turns.text1: The room is silent, Sack appears to be resting
turns.dealdamage: It seemed to feel that.. maybe keep going?
turns.miss: He's still, don't miss next time
